pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Open-source firmware for the Senoko battery/passthrough board.
Builds from source /lib/firmware/senoko.hex (for reference, the underlying ELF-format binary is also installed, to /usr/share/firmware-senoko/senoko.elf).
Once created, you can use the utility update-senoko (from package dev-embedded/update-senoko) to write senoko.hex to the board.
